title: Nike feels squeeze from strong dollar and discounts
description: Nike has warned that its profits will continue to be squeezed by the strong dollar and discounts aimed at cutting its stockpile of goods.

title: Work between Figma and FigJam
description: You can copy and paste assets between fils to progress your design process.Working between multiple devices?You can move Figma content from your apps.

title: Kronos Worldwide, Inc. Reports Fourth Quarter 2022 Results
description: Dallas, Texas, March 08, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE). Kronos Worldwide, Inc. (NYSE:KRO) today reported a net loss of $19.9 million, or $.18 per share, in the fourth quarter of 2022 compared to net income of $31.6 million, or $.28 per share, in the fourth quarter of 2021. For the full year of 2022, Kronos Worldwide reported net income of $104.5 million, or $0.90 per share, compared to net income of $112.9 million, or $.98 per share for the full year of 2021.
